name: Structural Biology and Molecular Biophysics
impact_statement: eLife publishes research that uses techniques including X-ray crystallography, cryo-EM and single-molecule methods. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in the fields of biophysics and structural biology.

name: Plant Biology
impact_statement: eLife publishes plant biology research including development, epigenetics, genomics, signalling, metabolism and plantâ€“microbe interactions. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in plant biology.

name: Neuroscience
impact_statement: eLife publishes research including brain function, neuronal circuits, synapses, sensory processing and motor pattern generation. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in neuroscience.

name: Microbiology and Infectious Disease
impact_statement: eLife publishes research covering virology, bacteriology and mycology. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in the fields of microbiology and infectious disease.

name: Immunology and Inflammation
impact_statement: eLife publishes research spanning allergy, immunity and immunoregulation, inflammation and T-cell receptor signalling. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in the field of immunology.

name: Human Biology and Medicine
impact_statement: eLife publishes research in clinical and translational research, human genetics, cancer, diabetes and developmental disorders. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in human biology and medicine.

name: Genomics and Evolutionary Biology
impact_statement: eLife publishes research spanning adaptation, morphology, bioinformatics and comparative genomics. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in the fields of genomics and/or evolutionary biology.

name: Genes and Chromosomes
impact_statement: eLife publishes research ranging from transcription and RNA processing to epigenetics and chromatin biology. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers interested in genes and chromosomes.

name: Epidemiology and Global Health
impact_statement: eLife publishes research spanning malaria, tuberculosis, trypanosomiasis, HIV/AIDS and drug discovery. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in epidemiology and global health.

name: Ecology
impact_statement: eLife publishes research ranging from chemical and microbial ecology to plant-insect interactions and extinction risk. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in ecology.

name: Developmental Biology and Stem Cells
impact_statement: eLife publishes research on stem cells, differentiation, tissue assembly and regeneration. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in the fields of developmental biology and stem cells.

name: Computational and Systems Biology
impact_statement: eLife publishes research involving the use of methods, models and software. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in computational and systems biology.

name: Cell Biology
impact_statement: eLife publishes research spanning vesicle transport and signal transduction to cell cycle and cell polarity and fate. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in cell biology.

name: Cancer Biology
impact_statement: eLife publishes research into cancer spanning from oncogenes and tumor suppressors to metastasis and anticancer treatments. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in cancer biology.

name: Biophysics and Structural Biology
impact_statement: eLife publishes research that uses techniques including X-ray crystallography, cryo-EM and single-molecule methods. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in the fields of biophysics and structural biology.

aims_and_scope.text: eLife aims to publish papers that provide new mechanistic insights into the structure, function, and regulation of biological molecules including proteins, nucleic acids, lipids, carbohydrates, and natural products. In addition, we are interested in studies that illuminate complex biological processes using chemical tools and approaches.

name: Biochemistry and Chemical Biology
impact_statement: eLife publishes research spanning chemical biology and enzymology to metabolism and membrane proteins. Decisions are made by journal editors who are active researchers in biochemistry.
